original_title: A Red Cross Martyr; or, on the Firing Lines of Tripoli
overview: Lieutenant Troyano, a young Italian officer, bids his sweetheart, Marie Petrini, a fond farewell and then rushes to war. In reading a detailed newspaper account of the battle, Marie sees an appeal for Red Cross nurses. Leaving her luxurious home and arriving at Tripoli, she takes up the duties assigned to her. She is beloved by all who require her services
title: A Red Cross Martyr; or, on the Firing Lines of Tripoli
